string.text: Tushkano frito

Una ración de tushkano frito, condimentado con sal y ají picante. The cheapest hot meal available in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Chuletas de perro

Una pequeña comida caliente de chuletas de perro a la parrilla mezclada con ajo, pimientos y champiñones. A cheap alternative to the more popular boar beef.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Chuletas de pseudoperro

Portion of grilled pseudodog meat chops. Good nutrition value due to thick muscles of the animal.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Tocino graso

Slices of fat and greasy bacon made from mutated pigs commonly known as fleshes.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Chuletas de jabalí

A small portion of boar meat, grilled and seasoned with salt and mixed with peppers. The most popular warm meal among stalkers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Cocido húngaro de chupasangre

A small hot meal made from bloodsucker meat spiced with chilies and mixed with mushrooms.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Psysucker goulash

A small hot meal made from psysucker meat spiced with chilies and mixed with mushrooms.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Mano de snork a la parrilla

Grilled snork hand, ready to be eaten. WARNING: Most Zoners consider eating snork's meat cannibalistic and immoral. However, certain factions, such as bandits and mercenaries, include it in their meals so as to show their superiority over other groups.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
La Comida Masculina

Una ración de carne de quimera a la parrilla, servida con champiñones y especias. An expensive meal, eaten most commonly by veteran Stalkers to celebrate accomplishment of difficult missions.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Lurker chops

A small portion of lurker meat, grilled and seasoned with salt and mixed with peppers. Good nutrition value due to thick muscles of the mutant.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Carne de "carne"

Una opción popular en la Zona, la carne de "Carne" tiene un buen sabor y alto valor nutricional. Los científicos ya tienen suficientes muestras, lo que limita su uso como mercancía. However, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] low-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Carne de jabalí

La carne más popular en la Zona. Nutritiva y poco contaminada. Los científicos ya tienen suficientes muestras, lo que limita su uso como mercancía. However, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] low-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Carne de perro

La carne de perros mutados se utiliza como una alternativa barata a la carne de jabalí, más popular. Los científicos ya tienen suficientes muestras, lo que limita su uso como mercancía. However, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] low-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Carne de pseudoperro

La carne de pseudoperro es un componente común en la dieta de la Zona. Sabroso, con alto valor nutricional, una opción popular entre los stalkers. Se puede vender a los científicos. Moreover, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] low-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Carne de chupasangre

La carne de chupasangre es fibrosa y por lo tanto no es adecuada para comer. Although bloodsuckers are fearsome beasts, the price of the meat is not very high due to its limited use. Se puede vender a los científicos. Moreover, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Psysucker meat

Similar to bloodsuckers, Psysucker meat is stringy and thus not suited for eating. The price of the meat is not very high due to its limited use. Se puede vender a los científicos. Moreover, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Mano de snork

Como es ampliamente conocido, los snorks provienen de los humanos, por lo que comer su carne se considera caníbal e inmoral. Sin embargo, ciertas facciones, como bandidos y mercenarios, lo incluyen en sus comidas para mostrar su superioridad sobre otros grupos. Can be sold to the scientists who make better use of it.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] low-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Fracture hand

A severed hand of a fracture - an extremely deformed humanoid mutant. Lo cierto es que estas criaturas solían ser humanos y que son el resultado directo del segundo incidente de Chernobyl. From the remains of their clothing we can deduce that fractures originate from prisoner population that was stationed in the Exclusion Zone and sentenced to forced labour. Since all fractures suffer almost the same type of deformation of the body, it is supposed that when the exposure took place all subjects were in the same body position - either because they were being transported at the time or because someone forced them. Todas las muestras encontradas hasta ahora eran masculinas y estériles. Hence it can be safely assumed that the fracture population is unable to reproduce, and their number in the Zone will be steadily dwindling. For this reason, at present they remain one of the most rarely encountered types of mutant. The right hand of a fracture is a valuable research object.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Mano de zombie

Se trata de una mano de una vieja criatura llamada zombi - ex seres humanos que vivían o trabajaban en la Zona de Exclusión y que estaban sometidos a cantidades extremás de radiación e influencia psíquica cuando ocurrió el segundo incidente de Chernobyl. Después de muchos años en ese estado, poseen solo un cuerpo frágil con huesos y carne medio podrida claramente visibles. For this reason, the creatures very much resemble re-animated dead bodies, however they are very much alive and almost permanently hungry and thus can become a threat when encountered in packs. Severed hand not only constitutes a scientific research material but in many cases can also be used to identify the person to whom the hand belonged.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Trozo de carne de quimera

Un trozo pesado de carne de quimera. Dado que las quimeras son consideradas una de las criaturas más peligrosas, su carne es muy valorada por los stalkers veteranos que están dispuestos a comprarla a precios bastante altos. The cook on Skadovsk uses this meat as one of the ingredients of the so called masculine meal, although only few claim that it tastes better than boar meat. Se puede vender a los científicos. Furthermore, it provides the best quality animal fat available in the Zone which can be used for the purposes of very effective gun lubrication.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Lurker meat

A good chunk of lurker meat. Nutritiva y poco contaminada. Se puede vender a los científicos. However, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Rodent meat

A small portion of a mutated rodent's body. Un alimento barato y comúnmente encontrado que se dice que fortalece el corazón después de haber sido cocinado en la hoguera. Can be sold to the scientists.
 
 %c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] low-tier mutant meat
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] cookable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
Ojo de Carne

El ojo mutado e hinchado de un "Carne" tiene varias características extrañas, la más interesante y potencialmente útil es la capacidad de reparar incluso el daño severo sufrido por el organismo. The specifics of this process are hitherto unknown, although the discovery of the mechanism behind it would most certainly revolutionize modern medicine by providing cures for many diseases. You can play a part in speeding up the progress of science and save the lives of innocent people by selling eyes of fleshes to the scientists.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Pierna de jabalí

Hoofs of boars can be used to produce various drugs, for example anti-radiation serums.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Cola de perro

Resistance of mutant dogs' skin to electricity and chemical agents has been the object of scientific interest for a long time. Due to the absence of fat tissue, the tail is especially suited for lab tests.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Cola de pseudoperro

Rumour has it that a certain trend has recently taken over the fashion world: fur from the tails of pseudodogs. The fur is reportedly soft like no other. También se dice que te mantendrá caliente incluso en las tormentas de nieve y ventiscas más feroces. For these reasons, pseudodog tails are in high demand.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Mandíbula de chupasangre

Los tentáculos de chupasangre contienen una glándula especial que produce una enzima capaz de disolver la piel y, simultáneamente, evitar la coagulación de la sangre. Discovering the enzyme's composition could be the cornerstone of a whole series of great medical advances. Algunos stalkers tienden a usar colmillos de chupasangre para hacer collares y amuletos. It is thus safe to say that bloodsucker jaw is one of the most popular pieces of jewelry found in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Pierna de snork

Los pies y piernas de Snork contienen una gran cantidad de tendones altamente elásticos. This explains the beast's ability to perform its characteristic long leaps at its prey. The scientists still look for potential uses of the snork's leg, and will be grateful for each specimen you bring to their base.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Cuerno de quimera

El cuerno de una quimera. Its exact molecular composition is unknown, but we know for a fact that its tip is as durable and sharp as a diamond, which explains why the beast is able to cut through armour with ease. Este artículo tiene una gran demanda ya que es visiblemente similar a un cuerno de rinoceronte. Rumour has it that once upon a time a few poachers arrived in the Zone with the aim of acquiring the horn and selling it on the black market. To their surprise, however, chimeras did not make such easy targets as rhinos, so the poachers were never heard from again. All that remains of them are some unpleasant memories and belongings which indicate where they must have been ripped to pieces by these vicious mutants. Chimera’s horn can also be used as a crude sharpening tool, but utmost caution should be exercised because it can break, preventing the careless stalker from selling this valuable specimen.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] very rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Garra quimera

La garra de una quimera. Its exact molecular composition is unknown, but we know for a fact that it is as durable and sharp as a diamond, which explains why the beast is able to cut through armour with ease.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] very rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Lurker eye

A mutated, yellow eye of a lurker. The glow surrounding the big pupil made the lurker's eye a matter of interest among local hunters. The scientists still look for potential uses of the lurker's eye.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Lurker tail

Scientists suggest that the characteristics of a lurker tail is proof that lurkers are a mutant species of tushkano.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Psysucker hand

Psysuckers are known for their skinny hands and long fingers. It seems that the skin around the fingertips is badly torn, which explains all the blood covering the fingers. The scientists will gladly examine it in the hope of finding the source of mutation responsible for its psy-related powers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Cabeza de Tushkano

La cabeza de un tushkano. The scientists would like to study it in order to identify which creature tushkanos originate from.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Tejido cerebral de controlador

Controllers have potent mental powers and it's safe to say that these powers have their origin in their brain. What's interesting, every mutant possessing abilities related to psy waves has a brain of similar structure. Los científicos pagarán generosamente por este tejido. It has a smell reminiscent of a sour pumpkin.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] very rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] extremely valuable
Mano de controlador

El controlador parece usar su mano cuando ataca mentalmente a su presa. The scientists will gladly examine it in the hope of finding the source of mutation responsible for its psy-related powers. Smells like old socks and bad kimchee.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] very rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Cola de gato

Cats in the Zone are bigger than their pet cousins and are in fact very dangerous predators, capable of moving swiftly and without a sound, no matter the surface. Within the stalker community, a cat's tail is a symbol of awareness.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Mano de pseudogigante

Una mano de un pseudogigante puede ser útil para los científicos. que gustosamente la examinarán. Smells like old socks and bad kimchee.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] very rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Ojo de pseudogigante

Un ojo de pseudogigante tiene la apariencia de un ojo humano más grande, pero con algunas diferencias. It has a multi-coloured iris and its tear glands are exceptionally well-developed. Pseudogiants are known to lacrimate profusely and regularly, but we don't know whether this is a result of some physiological process or a by-product of the psychology of the creature. In any case, the scientists would be very eager to lay their hands on it, so they're willing to pay a high price for any specimen.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] very rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Mano de Burer

Burer's hand seems to play a vital role in the creature's use of the telekinetic powers. Los científicos con gusto la examinarán con la esperanza de encontrar la fuente de la mutación. Smells like old socks and bad kimchee.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] very rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Pico de cuervo mutado

While many stalkers consider crows no more than pests, more insightful ones acknowledge their usefulness in tackling the many challenges the Zone presents. While murders of crows can prove invaluable navigating and evading danger on the empty streets of Chernobyl and Pripyat, it's only after their death when their true value is manifested.
 
The population of crows grows constantly in spite of the increased knowledge of usefulness of their beaks. It seems accelerated adaptation, typical among Zone's fauna, has provided them with a sped-up reproduction cycle resulting in up to 4 egg lays a year. Their prolonged life-span, of up to 20 years, has given them extraordinary intelligence manifested especially when many crows are in proximity.
 
This last effect has led to a rather peculiar custom among the some of the Zone-dwellers which - as rumor has it - was introduced by the very first Stalkers who arrived in the Zone after the Second Incident. The ritual - aptly referred to as "The Beak" - involves taking a pulverized beak from the eldest crow in the murder and creating a special mixture. When the concoction is consumed by the light of the full moon, it allows one's mind to temporarily merge with the multi-consciousness shared by all crows in the Zone. No one knows what happens to a fragile human mind when it is subjected to such an experience, but some speculate that this is what led the Stalker Noah to build his Arc in a desperate attempt to preserve whatever possible from the inevitable cataclysm that is about to once again fall upon this already devastated land.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Máscara de snork

Masks worn by snorks are apparently a version of GP-5, a Soviet gas mask, which was commonly used by soldiers as well as research and utility crews operating in the Zone when the second Chernobyl disaster occurred. Some of these people were working in numerous underground labouratories in which they were sealed from the outside world and exposed to tremendous amounts of radiation, which produced a creature we know as the snork. La máscara, aunque está rota más allá del uso (con las lentes rotas y la manguera de filtro perforada), sigue siendo solicitada por la comunidad científica. It can also be used to repair parts of outfits, but this process results in all remaining organic material being lost.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] broken beyond repair
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Hígado de perro

Hígado de un perro, que ha sufrido cambios severos debido a una dieta tóxica y la falta de agua potable en la Zona. The liver is of particular interest to scientists due to its potential for aiding research in medicine for liver diseases.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] the mutated part of the body
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific instance
Corazón de perro

Los perros ciegos tienen muchos rasgos, muy diferentes de los perros sanos. One of these differences - a very hardy heart, allowing the mutant for a long time to chase down its prey, until it's exhausted. Durante la persecución el pulso alcanza los 250 latidos por minuto, lo cual es impensable para individuos sanos no aterogénicos de la misma categoría de peso. This endurance makes the blind dog's heart an interesting subject for study, but because of its prevalence, the rates for it among scientists are very small.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Tiroides de gato

Long-term residence in radiation-contaminated territories resulted in the fact that the thyroid gland of local cats has multiplied in size. Actualmente el hipertiroidismo tras el cambio de generaciones no se adquiere, sino que es una enfermedad hereditaria. Symptoms: increased food intake, increased activity, behaviour changes, nervousness, hair loss. Estas habilidades adquiridas no se pierden, sino que permiten que los animales mutados desplacen rápidamente a sus parientes saludables y ocupen una posición elevada en la cadena alimentaria. Great interest for scientists is not due to the study of mechanisms and effects of disease.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Garra de gato

Cat's claws have an unknown structure, due to which they can easily cut jumpsuits. Scientists and military believe that a thorough study of them will help to create new highly durable materials and armour based on them.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Colmillo de jabalí

Posing a considerable threat to anything caught in its strike, this fang spans a length of 30 centimetres. No tiene ningún interés particular para los científicos en la Zona debido a su composición y fuerza mediocre. The fang is commonly used as a trophy among stalkers and has found its way as a collector's item outside of the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Corazón de chupasangre

Bloodsucker's heart have an unstudied ability - it secretes special enzymes which halt the coagulation process caused by incompatible blood types. Gracias a eso, la coagulación no ocurre incluso si los grupos sanguíneos son diferentes. The studies on the way this mechanism works and the composition of the enzyme will allow scientists to solve the problem of blood donor for patients with rare blood groups, as well as, probably, will open new doors for medicine.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Colmillo de pesudoperro

Los colmillos de pesudoperro se utilizan para rasgar y sostener a su presa. Debido a la tremenda presión mandibular del mutante, puede morder la mayor parte del equipo de protección utilizado en la Zona. Los dientes en sí no son demasiado fuertes y se reemplazan rutinariamente durante su la vida. Scientists are not particularly interested in them, unlike collectors from the outside of the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] common scientific specimen
Cerebro de Burer

Burer have a perfect telepathic skills, which are absolutely unstudied by the science. That's why most of his organs are desirable by scientists and mercenaries. The brain, as the main source of his telepathic abilities, has a top-priority in this list. It's mass is a 0.5-1.5 times bigger than a human brain. There's no any external differences. Because of its size and structure the brain can be easily damaged during extraction: wasted organ can't be used in any scientific researches.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Corazón de quimera

Fitting the creature's doubly nature, this heart of a chimera has grown into a doubled organ that can function as a reserve blood supply. De interés para los científicos es su capacidad de alto nivel de regeneración, proporcionando a la quimera habilidades continuas en combate incluso después de sufrir lesiones graves. It is being sought after to aid in the study of death rates among Siamese twins.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Psi-Dog Brain

Psi-Dogs have powerful physic abilities, for example, the ability to induce "hallucinations" upon prey. These illusions are extremely convincing, often capable of inflicting very real trauma through currently unknown means. Interestedly, scientists say that while they've identified the region of the brain responsible for the psionic abilities, it's evident that the region is "juvenile" in both development and evolutionary potential. Scientists will pay generously for samples of such tissues. 
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Mutated body part
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] High value
Horse meat

A piece of meat high in both nutrition and radiation. Los científicos ya tienen suficientes muestras, lo que limita su uso como mercancía. Source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[d_red]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinosis or brucellosis. Estas enfermedades se transmiten al ingerir carne infectada. Los síntomas incluyen fiebre, fatiga y pérdida del apetito, los cuales son extremadamente peligrosos dadas las condiciones en la Zona. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumours on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
%c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] low-tier mutant meat
%c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] not cookable
%c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] toxic food
%c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] radiation poisoning: %c[ui_gray_1] +646 mSv
Horse tail

A long, frayed tail, presumably from a local horse. The scientists have enough samples already, which limits its use as a commodity.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] mutated body part
